content:
ReliableCollectionsActorStateProvider ReliableCollectionsActorStateProvider Class

In this Article

Edit

Provides an implementation of IActorStateProvider which uses IReliableStateManager to store and persist the actor state.

Syntax

Declaration

public sealed class ReliableCollectionsActorStateProvider : IActorStateProvider, IStateProviderReplica, VolatileLogicalTimeManager.ISnapshotHandler, IActorStateProviderInternalPublic NotInheritable Class ReliableCollectionsActorStateProvider
    Implements IActorStateProvider, IStateProviderReplica, VolatileLogicalTimeManager.ISnapshotHandler, IActorStateProviderInternal

  • Edit
    ReliableCollectionsActorStateProvider(ReliableStateManagerConfiguration, Int32, Int32)
    ReliableCollectionsActorStateProvider(ReliableStateManagerConfiguration, Int32, Int32)

    Initializes a new instance of the ReliableDictionaryActorStateProvider class with specified configuration.

    public ReliableCollectionsActorStateProvider(ReliableStateManagerConfiguration stateManagerConfig, int actorStateDictionaryCount, int reminderDictionaryCount)Public Sub New(stateManagerConfig As ReliableStateManagerConfiguration, actorStateDictionaryCount As Integer, reminderDictionaryCount As Integer)

    Parameters

    • stateManagerConfig
      ReliableStateManagerConfiguration
      ReliableStateManagerConfiguration

      A ReliableStateManagerConfiguration that describes IReliableStateManager configuration.

    • actorStateDictionaryCount
      Int32
      Int32

      Number of IReliableDictionary<TKey, TValue> across which actor states will be partitioned and stored.

    • reminderDictionaryCount
      Int32
      Int32

      Number of IReliableDictionary<TKey, TValue> across which reminders will be partitioned and stored.

    Remarks

    Values for actorStateDictionaryCount and reminderDictionaryCount can be specified only once when the Actor Service is created for first time. It cannot be changed after that and ReliableCollectionsActorStateProvider will ignore any values that are different from first time.
